text: Nevzhe vony, zamistʹ vykonannya obitsyanoho, chekayutʹ chohosʹ inshoho? Toho Dnya, koly tse zdiysnytʹsya, skazhutʹ ti, yaki ranishe zabuly pro [Pysannya]: «Poslantsi Hospoda nashoho prykhodyly z istynoyu. Chy mayemo zastupnykiv, yaki b zastupylysya za nas? Chy povernutʹ nas nazad, shchob my robyly ne te, shcho robyly ranishe?» Vony vtratyly samykh sebe. Zalyshyly yikh ti, koho vyhaduvaly vony
